name: OFAC SDN Ingestion Pipeline
description: Parses the OFAC SDN Advanced XML from GCS and loads it into BigQuery. Supports weekly full-refresh ingestion with complete data capture including nested entities, aliases, addresses, ID documents, and vessel/aircraft info.

parameters.name: gcs_path
parameters.label: GCS path of the OFAC SDN XML file
parameters.helpText: Full GCS URI of the downloaded SDN_ADVANCED.XML file. Example: gs://ofac-raw-myproject/raw/SDN_ADVANCED_20260218.XML

parameters.name: bq_table
parameters.label: BigQuery destination table
parameters.helpText: Fully-qualified BigQuery table in project:dataset.table format. Example: myproject:ofac_sanctions.sdn_list
